005package edu.wpi.first.util;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
009import java.io.File;
010import java.io.IOException;
011import java.nio.file.Files;
012import java.nio.file.Paths;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.HashMap;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Objects;
018
019/** Loads dynamic libraries for all platforms. */
020public final class CombinedRuntimeLoader {
021  private CombinedRuntimeLoader() {}
022
023  private static boolean skipSetDllDirectory;
024
025  /**
026   * Flag to test not setting DLL directory for loading.
027   *
028   * @param skip Skip setting DLL directory
029   */
030  public static synchronized void setSkipSetDllDirectory(boolean skip) {
031    skipSetDllDirectory = skip;
032  }
033
034  private static synchronized boolean getSkipSetDllDirectory() {
035    return skipSetDllDirectory;
036  }
037
038  private static String extractionDirectory;
039
040  /**
041   * Returns library extraction directory.
042   *
043   * @return Library extraction directory.
044   */
045  public static synchronized String getExtractionDirectory() {
046    return extractionDirectory;
047  }
048
049  private static synchronized void setExtractionDirectory(String directory) {
050    extractionDirectory = directory;
051  }
052
053  private static String defaultExtractionRoot;
054
055  /**
056   * Gets the default extraction root location (~/.wpilib/nativecache) for use if
057   * setExtractionDirectory is not set.
058   *
059   * @return The default extraction root location.
060   */
061  public static synchronized String getDefaultExtractionRoot() {
062    if (defaultExtractionRoot != null) {
063      return defaultExtractionRoot;
064    }
065    String home = System.getProperty("user.home");
066    defaultExtractionRoot = Paths.get(home, ".wpilib", "nativecache").toString();
067    return defaultExtractionRoot;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Returns platform path.
072   *
073   * @return The current platform path.
074   * @throws IllegalStateException Thrown if the operating system is unknown.
075   */
076  public static String getPlatformPath() {
077    String filePath;
078    String arch = System.getProperty("os.arch");
079
080    boolean intel32 = "x86".equals(arch) || "i386".equals(arch);
081    boolean intel64 = "amd64".equals(arch) || "x86_64".equals(arch);
082
083    if (System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Windows")) {
084      if (intel32) {
085        filePath = "/windows/x86/";
086      } else {
087        filePath = "/windows/x86-64/";
088      }
089    } else if (System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Mac")) {
090      filePath = "/osx/universal/";
091    } else if (System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Linux")) {
092      if (intel32) {
093        filePath = "/linux/x86/";
094      } else if (intel64) {
095        filePath = "/linux/x86-64/";
096      } else if (new File("/usr/local/frc/bin/frcRunRobot.sh").exists()) {
097        filePath = "/linux/athena/";
098      } else if ("arm".equals(arch) || "arm32".equals(arch)) {
099        filePath = "/linux/arm32/";
100      } else if ("aarch64".equals(arch) || "arm64".equals(arch)) {
101        filePath = "/linux/arm64/";
102      } else {
103        filePath = "/linux/nativearm/";
104      }
105    } else {
106      throw new IllegalStateException();
107    }
108
109    return filePath;
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * Sets DLL directory.
114   *
115   * @param directory Directory.
116   * @return DLL directory.
117   */
118  public static native String setDllDirectory(String directory);
119
120  private static String setDllDirectoryShim(String directory) {
121    if (getSkipSetDllDirectory()) {
122      return null;
123    } else {
124      return setDllDirectory(directory);
125    }
126  }
127
128  private static String getLoadErrorMessage(String libraryName, UnsatisfiedLinkError ule) {
129    StringBuilder msg = new StringBuilder(512);
130    msg.append(libraryName)
131        .append(" could not be loaded from path\n" + "\tattempted to load for platform ")
132        .append(getPlatformPath())
133        .append("\nLast Load Error: \n")
134        .append(ule.getMessage())
135        .append('\n');
136    if (System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Windows")) {
137      msg.append(
138          "A common cause of this error is missing the C++ runtime.\n"
139              + "Download the latest at https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2977003/the-latest-supported-visual-c-downloads\n");
140    }
141    return msg.toString();
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Extract a list of native libraries.
146   *
147   * @param <T> The class where the resources would be located
148   * @param clazz The actual class object
149   * @param resourceName The resource name on the classpath to use for file lookup
150   * @return List of all libraries that were extracted
151   * @throws IOException Thrown if resource not found or file could not be extracted
152   */
153  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
154  public static <T> List<String> extractLibraries(Class<T> clazz, String resourceName)
155      throws IOException {
156    TypeReference<HashMap<String, Object>> typeRef = new TypeReference<>() {};
157    ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
158    Map<String, Object> map;
159    try (var stream = clazz.getResourceAsStream(resourceName)) {
160      map = mapper.readValue(stream, typeRef);
161    }
162
163    var platformPath = Paths.get(getPlatformPath());
164    var platform = platformPath.getName(0).toString();
165    var arch = platformPath.getName(1).toString();
166
167    var platformMap = (Map<String, List<String>>) map.get(platform);
168
169    var fileList = platformMap.get(arch);
170
171    var extractionPathString = getExtractionDirectory();
172
173    if (extractionPathString == null) {
174      String hash = (String) map.get("hash");
175
176      var defaultExtractionRoot = getDefaultExtractionRoot();
177      var extractionPath = Paths.get(defaultExtractionRoot, platform, arch, hash);
178      extractionPathString = extractionPath.toString();
179
180      setExtractionDirectory(extractionPathString);
181    }
182
183    List<String> extractedFiles = new ArrayList<>();
184
185    byte[] buffer = new byte[0x10000]; // 64K copy buffer
186
187    for (var file : fileList) {
188      try (var stream = clazz.getResourceAsStream(file)) {
189        Objects.requireNonNull(stream);
190
191        var outputFile = Paths.get(extractionPathString, new File(file).getName());
192        extractedFiles.add(outputFile.toString());
193        if (outputFile.toFile().exists()) {
194          continue;
195        }
196        var parent = outputFile.getParent();
197        if (parent == null) {
198          throw new IOException("Output file has no parent");
199        }
200        parent.toFile().mkdirs();
201
202        try (var os = Files.newOutputStream(outputFile)) {
203          int readBytes;
204          while ((readBytes = stream.read(buffer)) != -1) { // NOPMD
205            os.write(buffer, 0, readBytes);
206          }
207        }
208      }
209    }
210
211    return extractedFiles;
212  }
213
214  /**
215   * Load a single library from a list of extracted files.
216   *
217   * @param libraryName The library name to load
218   * @param extractedFiles The extracted files to search
219   * @throws IOException If library was not found
220   */
221  public static void loadLibrary(String libraryName, List<String> extractedFiles)
222      throws IOException {
223    String currentPath = null;
224    String oldDllDirectory = null;
225    try {
226      if (System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Windows")) {
227        var extractionPathString = getExtractionDirectory();
228        oldDllDirectory = setDllDirectoryShim(extractionPathString);
229      }
230      for (var extractedFile : extractedFiles) {
231        if (extractedFile.contains(libraryName)) {
232          // Load it
233          currentPath = extractedFile;
234          System.load(extractedFile);
235          return;
236        }
237      }
238      throw new IOException("Could not find library " + libraryName);
239    } catch (UnsatisfiedLinkError ule) {
240      throw new IOException(getLoadErrorMessage(currentPath, ule));
241    } finally {
242      if (oldDllDirectory != null) {
243        setDllDirectoryShim(oldDllDirectory);
244      }
245    }
246  }
247
248  /**
249   * Load a list of native libraries out of a single directory.
250   *
251   * @param <T> The class where the resources would be located
252   * @param clazz The actual class object
253   * @param librariesToLoad List of libraries to load
254   * @throws IOException Throws an IOException if not found
255   */
256  public static <T> void loadLibraries(Class<T> clazz, String... librariesToLoad)
257      throws IOException {
258    // Extract everything
259
260    var extractedFiles = extractLibraries(clazz, "/ResourceInformation.json");
261
262    String currentPath = "";
263
264    if (!getSkipSetDllDirectory()) {
265      try {
266        if (System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Windows")) {
267          var extractionPathString = getExtractionDirectory();
268          // Load windows, set dll directory
269          currentPath = Paths.get(extractionPathString, "WindowsLoaderHelper.dll").toString();
270          System.load(currentPath);
271        }
272      } catch (UnsatisfiedLinkError ule) {
273        throw new IOException(getLoadErrorMessage(currentPath, ule));
274      }
275    }
276
277    for (var library : librariesToLoad) {
278      loadLibrary(library, extractedFiles);
279    }
280  }
281}
